title: New eSports team looking for Coach
body:
Paragon eSports is Currently looking for a new Coach.

We are an upcoming LoL Team looking to compete in amateur tournaments ranging from OCE Weekly to Cyber Gamer

We are looking for a some what experienced coach to help us out in pick and bans, early map movements and analysing games.

The type of coach we are looking for is someone who isn't afraid to give criticism or receive it as well as someone who as had some success in soloq and Previous teams as well.

Please email us at @paragonesportslol@gmail.com with your application
Age?
IGN?
Previous Teams?
Coaching Experience?
Short Personal Bio

- Miracle
Team Captain, Owner and Support for Paragon eSports
@PGNMiracle - @PGN_eSports

replies.body:
>"The type of coach we are looking for is someone who **is **afraid to give criticism or receive it as well as someone who as had some success in soloq and Previous teams as well."

Someone who **isn't** afraid, you mean.
They obviously want a coach to make them feel all better.
